title: Primary media studies
creator_credit: Stephen Skok, Film Media Studies and Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
brief_description: Indicates various types of activities that could be included in a primary media studies course. Shows hand drawing on film, making storyboards, exercises in persistence of vision, stimuli for creative writing, drama with video and script development.
creator_credit_for_label: Stephen Skok, Film Media Studies and Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
